title: SeeDS: Semantic Separable Diffusion Synthesizer for Zero-shot Food Detection
author: Pengfei Zhou
Weiqing Min
Yang Zhang
Jiajun Song
Ying Jin
Shuqiang Jiang
description: We propose a new task: Zero-Shot Food Detection (ZSFD). We also present SeeDS, which adopts Semantic Separable Synthesizing Module and Region Feature Denoising Diffusion Model to achieve fine-grained ZSFD. In addition, we establish the first ZSFD dataset and name it as ZSFooD.
publisher: ACM International Conference on Multimedia (ACM MM)

title: Self-supervised Enhancement for Named Entity Disambiguation via Multimodal Graph Convolution
author: Pengfei Zhou
Kaining Ying
Zhenhua Wang
Dongyan Guo
Cong Bai
description: We present MMGraph, which uses multimodal graph convolution to aggregate visual and contextual language information for accurate entity disambiguation for short texts, and a self-supervised framework Simple Triplet (SimTri) that can learn useful representations in multimodal unlabeled data to enhance the effectiveness of NED models.
publisher: IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems (TNNLS)

title: CMRDF: A Real-Time Food Alerting System Based on Multimodal Data
author: Pengfei Zhou
Cong Bai
Jie Xia
Shengyong Chen
description: We propose a novel system called Cross-Modal Retrieval on Diabetogenic Food (CMRDF), which realizes a real-time dietary notice based on multimodal data captured from wearable devices.

title: ISDA: Position-Aware Instance Segmentation with Deformable Attention
author: Kaining Ying
Zhenhua Wang
Cong Bai
Pengfei Zhou
description: We present a novel end-to-end Instance Segmentation framework based on Transformer and get 38.7 mAP with ResNet-50 on MS COCO test-dev.
publisher: IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech and Signal Processing (ICASSP)

title: Exploring Implicit and Explicit Relations with the Dual Relation-Aware Network for Image Captioning
author: Zhiwei Zha
Pengfei Zhou
Cong Bai
description: We introduce a novel Dual Relation-Aware Network (DRAN) for image captioning which composes of a dual-path relation encoder and an adaptive context relation decoder. The DRAN can address the problem that the relations that just appeared in sentences but cannot be visually observed in images

title: RWMF: A Real-World Multimodal Foodlog Database
author: Pengfei Zhou
Cong Bai
Kaining Ying
Jie Xia
Lixin Huang
description: We establish a real-world foodlog database using various methods such as filters, clusters and graph convolutional networks. This database is built based on real-world lifelog and medical data, which is named as Real-World Multimodal Foodlog (RWMF).

title: ZJUTCVR Team at ImageCLEFlifelog2019 Lifelog Moment Retrieval Task
author: Pengfei Zhou
Cong Bai
Jie Xia
description: We use several different methods to provide a flexible retrieval system based on the huge amounts of multi-modal dataset. The work proposes a supervised learning approach with high precision and two exploratory approaches. We reach the second rank with F1-measure@10=0.44 in the ImageCLEFlifelog 2019 evaluation system.
